zh: 昨晚我喝得烂醉，没洗澡就睡着了。

en: That man is a man content with his fate.
zh: 那个人是一个安于命运的人。

en: People must learn to be satisfied.
zh: 人们必须学会满足。

en: She lost her money, her family, her friends.
zh: 她失去了她的钱，她的家人，她的朋友。

en: Everything is upside down.
zh: 一切都颠倒了。

en: Is there an elevator?
zh: 有电梯吗？

en: I don't remember!
zh: 我不记得了！

en: I couldn't stand looking at it.
zh: 我简直看不下去。

en: I have two nieces.
zh: 我有两个侄女。

en: omg a n00b pwned me!
zh: 天啊，我被一个菜鸟打败了！

en: I want to speak about my love.
zh: 我想谈谈我的爱。

en: Nobody speaks to me.
zh: 没有人跟我说话。

en: I see fireworks!
zh: 我看到烟花了！

en: I think my German is really fucked up.
zh: 我觉得我的德语糟透了。

en: No, I'm not afraid of ghosts.
zh: 不，我不怕鬼。

en: We met on Sunday.
zh: 我们星期天见面的。

en: I don't have a spare shirt.
zh: 我没有多余的衬衫。

en: The net is huge.
zh: 这个网很大。

en: Well, OK. Continue.
zh: 好吧，可以。继续。

en: Ah! I forgot again! I was supposed to go to the library to return a book today!
zh: 啊！我又忘了！我今天应该去图书馆还书的！

en: The bell rang.
zh: 铃响了。

en: Write a paragraph using adjectives to describe the person's appearance.
zh: 写一段话，用形容词来描述这个人的外貌。

en: Fishing often starts to go with the start of the Ayu season.
zh: 捕鱼通常随着香鱼季节的开始而开始。

en: She is recognized to be an expert on linguistics.
zh: 她被公认为语言学专家。

en: This vending machine was destroyed by hoodlums last night.
zh: 这台自动售货机昨晚被流氓破坏了。

en: Okinawa is the southernmost island in Japan.
zh: 冲绳是日本最南端的岛屿。

en: How many copies of magazines are being printed in Japan across all Japanese magazines?
zh: 日本所有杂志总共印刷了多少本杂志？

en: I was searching for something that didn't exist.
zh: 我一直在寻找不存在的东西。

en: May the force be with you.
zh: 愿原力与你同在。

en: He is learning how to drive a car.
zh: 他正在学习如何开车。

en: Whose bike is this?
zh: 这是谁的自行车？

en: This is my bike.
zh: 这是我的自行车。

en: My dad doesn't like soccer.
zh: 我爸爸不喜欢足球。

en: Nobody likes war.
zh: 没有人喜欢战争。

en: If it rains tomorrow, I won't go to the picnic.
zh: 如果明天下雨，我就不去野餐了。

en: Prove that P is a poset.
zh: 证明P是一个偏序集。

en: You have dealt well with Your servant, O LORD, according to Your word.
zh: 耶和华啊，你向你的仆人行善，正如你所应许的。

en: It doesn't matter whether the cat is black or white as long as it catches mice.
zh: 不管黑猫白猫，能捉老鼠就是好猫。

en: You have three cats.
zh: 你有三只猫。

en: There are still a lot of dishes on the table.
zh: 桌子上还有很多盘子。

en: I prefer mature cheese.
zh: 我更喜欢味道浓郁的奶酪。

en: Nobody believes what I say.
zh: 没人相信我说的话。

en: This fruit is shaped like an orange and tastes like a pineapple.
zh: 这种水果形状像橙子，味道像菠萝。

en: He's picky about suits and ties.
zh: 他对西装和领带很挑剔。

en: Quickly!
zh: 快点！

en: Some people read the newspaper and watch TV at the same time.
zh: 有些人同时看报纸和看电视。

en: He is a recent convert to Catholicism.
zh: 他最近皈依了天主教。

en: She will worm the secret out of him. I had better trust her with it at once.
zh: 她会从他那里套出秘密的。我最好立刻信任她。

en: I couldn't stand a life without pleasures!
zh: 我无法忍受没有乐趣的生活！

en: I think Obama will win. It'll be a walkover!
zh: 我认为奥巴马会赢。那将是轻而易举的胜利！

en: You can do it. It'll be a cakewalk!
zh: 你能做到的。这会很容易！

en: I want to make a book cover like the leather-bound books that you get in Myst and Riven.
zh: 我想做一个像《神秘岛》和《瑞雯》里那种皮革装订的书籍封面。

en: I just got done with my French exam. It was a piece of cake!
zh: 我刚考完法语考试。那简直是小菜一碟！

en: The top of the mountain is covered in snow.
zh: 山顶被雪覆盖着。

en: A lifetime is short, but feels long.
zh: 一生很短暂，但感觉很漫长。

en: I need to take a shower.
zh: 我需要去洗个澡。

en: The insurance payments depend on the use intended (work or leisure).
zh: 保险金的支付取决于预期用途（工作或休闲）。

en: First you'll be asked if you're on business or leisure.
zh: 首先，你会被问到你是出差还是休闲。

en: If you find a mistake, please leave a comment.
zh: 如果你发现错误，请留下评论。

en: There are no comments yet.
zh: 目前还没有评论。

en: In Aesop's Fables is a story called "Sour Grapes".
zh: 在伊索寓言中有一个故事叫做《酸葡萄》。

en: You may have mistaken Jane for her sister.
zh: 你可能把简误认为她的妹妹了。

en: You might have mistaken Jane for her sister.
zh: 你可能把简误认为她的妹妹了。

en: She was very surprised when she heard the news.
zh: 当她听到这个消息时，她非常惊讶。

en: She was in a great hurry.
zh: 她当时非常匆忙。

en: He suggested setting off immediately.
zh: 他建议立即出发。

en: We'll cross that bridge when we come to it.
zh: 到时候再说。

en: Just as many memories of the past and feelings are stored up in the body as in the spirit.
zh: 正如许多过去的记忆和情感储存在精神中一样，也储存在身体中。

en: Do you need as many licenses as you have operating systems installed in a multi-boot PC?
zh: 在一台多重启动的电脑中，你需要和你安装的操作系统一样多的许可证吗？

en: We'll give you as many bonus miles as the normal air miles!
zh: 我们会给你和正常里程一样的奖励里程！

en: A small spark often kindles a large flame.
zh: 星星之火，可以燎原。

en: You have done these things, and I kept silence. You thought that the "I AM" was just like you. I will rebuke you, and accuse you in front of your eyes.
zh: 你做了这些事，而我一直沉默。你以为“我是”和你一样。我要责备你，并在你眼前指控你。

en: Be sure and remember to write a letter.
zh: 一定要记得写信。

en: Please don't forget to write the letter.
zh: 请不要忘记写信。

en: Not just 'child's independence'. Parents must also become independent of their children.
zh: 不仅仅是“孩子的独立”。父母也必须从孩子那里独立出来。

en: I live on my own and don't depend on my parents for money.
zh: 我独自生活，不靠父母的钱。

en: Even pigs can climb a tree when flattered.
zh: 恭维能让猪爬上树。

en: I'll have a coffee and a croissant.
zh: 我要一杯咖啡和一个羊角面包。

en: Not for school, but for life do we learn.
zh: 我们学习不是为了学校，而是为了生活。

en: Don't forget death.
zh: 勿忘死亡。

en: If you want to be loved, love!
zh: 如果你想被爱，就去爱吧！

en: There's nothing as precious as love.
zh: 没有什么比爱更珍贵。

en: Tom said, "budge over," forced his way in and sat down.
zh: 汤姆说：“挪一下”，然后挤了进去，坐了下来。

en: The friendship of a great man is a gift from the gods.
zh: 伟人的友谊是上帝的恩赐。

en: Certainly you may well be right.
zh: 当然，你很可能是对的。

en: Symmetry is boring.
zh: 对称很无聊。

en: My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?
zh: 我的神，我的神，你为什么离弃我？

en: Happy families are all alike; every unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
zh: 幸福的家庭都是相似的；不幸的家庭各有各的不幸。

en: Fine words and an insinuating appearance are seldom associated with true virtue.
zh: 花言巧语和谄媚的表情很少与真正的美德联系在一起。

en: Why is machine translation useless?
zh: 为什么机器翻译没用？

en: Whereof one cannot speak, thereof one must be silent.
zh: 凡是不可说的，必须保持沉默。

en: War is not a natural disaster like an earthquake or a tsunami. It does not come without warning.
zh: 战争不是像地震或海啸这样的自然灾害。它不会毫无预警地发生。

en: A cat will forget three years of kindness in three days, feed a dog for three days and he will remember it for three years.
zh: 猫三天就会忘记三年的恩情，狗喂三天就会记你三年。

en: When the cat is not there, the mice are dancing.
zh: 猫不在，老鼠跳舞。

en: When the cat's away, the mice will play.
zh: 山中无老虎，猴子称大王。

en: I am a cat. I don't have a name yet.
zh: 我是一只猫。我还没有名字。

en: Life is more hellish than hell itself.
zh: 人生比地狱本身更像地狱。

en: Love is merely a lyrical way of referring to lust.
zh: 爱只不过是用诗意的方式来指代欲望。

en: Freedom is akin to the rarified air of a mountain top. Weak men cannot bear one or the other.
zh: 自由就像山顶上稀薄的空气。弱者既不能承受自由，也不能承受稀薄的空气。

en: A fool always believes that it is the others who are fools.
zh: 傻瓜总是认为别人才是傻瓜。

en: A facet of genius is the ability to provoke scandals.
zh: 天才的一个方面是引发丑闻的能力。

en: Out of all the attributes of the gods, the one I find most pitiable is their inability to commit suicide.
zh: 在所有神祇的属性中，我发现最可怜的是他们无法自杀。

en: Life is as a box of matches. Treating it cautiously is foolish, not treating it cautiously is dangerous.
zh: 人生就像一盒火柴。小心翼翼地对待它是愚蠢的，不小心翼翼地对待它是危险的。

en: Those who do not know the sadness of love may not speak of it.
zh: 没有体会过爱情的悲伤的人，不能谈论爱情。

en: People who don't know the sadness of love aren't able to talk about the experience of love.
zh: 不懂爱情悲伤的人，无法谈论爱情的体验。

en: Love is a great contradiction. You cannot live without it but at the same time you will be hurt by it.
zh: 爱是一个巨大的矛盾。你不能没有它，但同时你也会被它伤害。

en: I will tell you what love is. It's very embarrassing.
zh: 我会告诉你什么是爱。那是非常令人尴尬的。

en: In all cases, love is perseverance.
zh: 在所有情况下，爱都是坚持。

en: Love is a pill made from a great many people's sufferings.
zh: 爱是一颗由许多人的痛苦制成的药丸。

en: The love of a young maiden is a poem. The love of an old maid is philosophy.
zh: 少女的爱是诗，老处女的爱是哲学。

en: When it comes to love, women are experts and men eternal novices.
zh: 说到爱情，女人是专家，男人永远是新手。

en: Love is the miracle of civilization.
zh: 爱是文明的奇迹。

en: There is nothing abnormal in having a child around forty.
zh: 四十岁左右生孩子没有什么不正常的。

en: People are most angry when they feel they are being mocked. That's why those who are confident in themselves seldom become angry.
zh: 人们在感到被嘲笑时最生气。这就是为什么那些对自己有信心的人很少生气。

en: In life as with omelets, the timing is important.
zh: 人生就像煎蛋卷，时机很重要。

en: The shepherd always tries to persuade the sheep that their interests and his own are the same.
zh: 牧羊人总是试图说服羊，他们的利益和他的利益是一致的。

en: Absolute privacy on Facebook is an illusion. It doesn't exist in reality.
zh: 在脸书上绝对的隐私是一种幻想。它在现实中不存在。

en: I want to think that parents are more important than their children.
zh: 我希望父母比他们的孩子更重要。

en: A few days ago, my girlfriend Sophie moved from Edmonton, Alberta to Victoria, British Columbia.
zh: 几天前，我的女朋友苏菲从阿尔伯塔省的埃德蒙顿搬到了不列颠哥伦比亚省的维多利亚。

en: We guarantee the cheapest price for a French language school in Quebec, Canada.
zh: 我们保证在加拿大魁北克省的法语学校提供最便宜的价格。

en: French from Quebec is spoken by more than 7 million speakers.
zh: 超过700万的人说魁北克的法语。

en: I came to Toronto at the beginning of June.
zh: 我六月初来到多伦多。

en: Looking at his email address, would you say he's American?
zh: 看看他的电子邮件地址，你会说他是美国人吗？

en: Psychology, which studies the human mind and human behavior, builds knowledge by observation and experiments.
zh: 心理学研究人类的思想和人类行为，通过观察和实验来构建知识。

en: The Lockheed scandal is a worldwide corruption scandal involving the major American plane manufacturer Lockheed. It came to light in February 1976 and revolved mainly around the acceptance of passenger plane contracts.
zh: 洛克希德丑闻是一起涉及美国主要飞机制造商洛克希德的全球腐败丑闻。它于1976年2月曝光，主要围绕接受客机合同展开。

en: The Japanese Dentists Association affair is an incident concerning secret donations from the Japanese Dentists Association to Diet members belonging to the LDP.
zh: 日本牙科医师协会事件是关于日本牙科医师协会向属于自民党的国会议员秘密捐款的事件。

en: The Recruit scandal is a corruption scandal concerning public officials and politicians who accepted as bribes undisclosed shares from the RecruitCoscom company. The shares had been rising steadily.
zh: 瑞可利丑闻是一起腐败丑闻，涉及接受瑞可利Coscom公司未公开股份作为贿赂的公职人员和政治家。这些股票一直在稳步上涨。

en: Bribes are something that arises in conjunction with power organizations.
zh: 贿赂是伴随权力组织而产生的东西。

en: "Metroid Prime 3: Corruption" is a videogame by Nintendo sold exclusively for the Wii.
zh: 《银河战士Prime 3：堕落》是任天堂为Wii独家销售的一款电子游戏。

en: Silvio Berlusconi is an Italian politician, the current Prime Minister of Italy, as well as a successful entrepreneur.
zh: 西尔维奥·贝卢斯科尼是一位意大利政治家，现任意大利总理，也是一位成功的企业家。

en: It's very difficult to transport them overland, but simple to do so by sea.
zh: 陆路运输它们非常困难，但海运却很简单。

en: Seagulls cause all types of disturbances by cackling loudly, spreading guano, tearing up garbage bags and attacking to get food.
zh: 海鸥通过大声嘎嘎叫、传播鸟粪、撕毁垃圾袋和攻击以获取食物来引起各种骚乱。

en: According to a Cornell University study, unattractive defendants are 22 percent more likely to be convicted than good-looking ones.
zh: 根据康奈尔大学的一项研究，相貌平平的被告比相貌好看的被告被判有罪的可能性高出22%。

en: Don't be shy.
zh: 别害羞。

en: In Korea, there's a popular theory that says that: "If you eat a quarter of an Iceberg lettuce, you will fall asleep". Thus, amongst truck drivers in Korea, lettuce is known as something that should not be eaten before work.
zh: 在韩国，有一种流行的说法是：“如果你吃四分之一的结球莴苣，你就会睡着”。因此，在韩国的卡车司机中，莴苣被认为是一种不应该在工作前吃的东西。

en: Cream is a white and light yellow liquid composed of concentrated proteins and fat.
zh: 奶油是一种白色和淡黄色的液体，由浓缩的蛋白质和脂肪组成。

en: Can you tell me your address?
zh: 你能告诉我你的地址吗？

en: Nyotaimori is where food, like sashimi, is laid out on a naked woman.
zh: 女体盛是将食物，如生鱼片，摆放在裸体女人身上。

en: Body sushi is where food, like sashimi, is laid out on a naked woman.
zh: 人体寿司是将食物，如生鱼片，摆放在裸体女人身上。

en: I love cats so much, I can't help it, I'm a crazy cat lover.
zh: 我太爱猫了，我忍不住，我是一个疯狂的爱猫人士。

en: Can anybody come with me to a Lady Gaga concert?
zh: 有没有人想和我一起去看Lady Gaga的演唱会？

en: Is there anybody who would like to go see a live concert of Lady Gaga with me?
zh: 有没有人想和我一起去看Lady Gaga的现场演唱会？

en: This room is quiet.
zh: 这个房间很安静。

en: The food was great in Italy.
zh: 在意大利吃的食物很棒。

en: The Italian food was delicious.
zh: 意大利食物很美味。

en: The restaurant was far from the station.
zh: 这家餐厅离车站很远。

en: The restaurant was far from the train station.
zh: 这家餐厅离火车站很远。

en: It had started to rain.
zh: 开始下雨了。

en: It's going to get steadily hotter from now.
zh: 从现在开始会越来越热。

en: Let's eat before we go.
zh: 我们走之前先吃点东西吧。

en: When you fall off the stairs, you're downstairs quickly.
zh: 当你从楼梯上摔下来时，你很快就到楼下了。

en: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
zh: 生活就像骑自行车。为了保持平衡，你必须不断前进。

en: Common sense is the collection of prejudices acquired by age eighteen.
zh: 常识是十八岁之前获得的偏见的集合。

en: Impossible is not French.
zh: 不可能不是法语。

en: The word "impossible" isn't in the French language.
zh: 法语中没有“不可能”这个词。

en: Impossible is not a French word.
zh: Impossible不是一个法语单词。

en: A society without religion is like a ship without a compass.
zh: 一个没有宗教的社会就像一艘没有指南针的船。

en: Men of genius are meteors destined to burn in order to illuminate their century.
zh: 天才人物是注定要燃烧以照亮他们世纪的流星。

en: He decided that if God didn't exist then everything was permitted.
zh: 他认为如果上帝不存在，那么一切都是允许的。

en: God, please give me chastity and continence, but not yet.
zh: 上帝啊，请赐予我贞洁和节制，但还不是现在。

en: God provides the wind, but man must raise the sails.
zh: 上帝提供风，但人必须扬起风帆。

en: I decided to be happy because it's good for my health.
zh: 我决定要快乐，因为这对我的健康有好处。

en: If God did not exist, we'd have to invent him.
zh: 如果上帝不存在，我们就必须创造他。

en: Let him that would move the world, first move himself.
zh: 想要移动世界的人，首先要移动自己。

en: Those who spend too much time traveling become strangers in their own country.
zh: 那些花太多时间旅行的人会成为自己国家的陌生人。

en: God is an infinite sphere whose center is everywhere and circumference is nowhere.
zh: 上帝是一个无限的球体，其中心无处不在，周界无处可寻。

en: The heart has its reasons, which reason does not know.
zh: 人心自有其道理，而理性却一无所知。

en: It is man's natural sickness to believe that he possesses the Truth.
zh: 人类天生的毛病就是相信自己掌握了真理。

en: Curiosity is nothing more than vanity. More often than not we only seek knowledge to show it off.
zh: 好奇心不过是虚荣心。很多时候，我们寻求知识只是为了炫耀。

en: They replied that because all 61 beds in the obstetrics/gynaecology department were full, no admissions were possible.
zh: 他们回答说，由于妇产科的61张床位都已满，因此无法再接收病人。

en: In the event that asbestos-covered mesh is found, ensure its safety by damping the asbestos portion to prevent dust release and wrapping in a plastic bag.
zh: 如果发现石棉覆盖的网状物，请通过润湿石棉部分以防止粉尘释放并用塑料袋包裹来确保其安全。

en: The explorer pushed his way through the trackless mountain region.
zh: 探险家艰难地穿过那片杳无人烟的山区。

en: To hell with conventions!
zh: 去他妈的传统习俗！

en: There are those, who, in distress, seek the help of other people's prayers, but have no mind to pray for themselves.
zh: 有些人，在困境中，寻求他人祈祷的帮助，却不愿为自己祈祷。

en: Before you give orders, you must learn to obey.
zh: 在你发号施令之前，你必须学会服从。

en: You must turn your tongue seven times in your mouth before you speak.
zh: 说话之前，你必须在嘴里转七次舌头。（三思而后行）

en: To catch the bull, grab its horns.
zh: 要抓住公牛，就抓住它的角。

en: You must eat to live. You must not live to eat.
zh: 你必须为了活着而吃。你不能为了吃而活着。

en: You must strike while the iron is hot.
zh: 你必须趁热打铁。

en: Shame be to him who thinks evil of it.
zh: 心怀邪念者可耻。

en: Help yourself and God will help you.
zh: 自助者天助。

en: After the rain, fair weather.
zh: 雨后天晴。

en: It's by smithing that one becomes a blacksmith.
zh: 熟能生巧。

en: Hurry slowly.
zh: 欲速则不达。

en: Lucky at cards, unlucky in love.
zh: 情场失意，赌场得意。

en: Even if malicious gossip is being circulated around someone, it doesn't necessarily mean that the value of that person will be diminished.
zh: 即使有人被恶意中伤，也并不意味着那个人的价值会因此降低。

en: The more I eat the bigger my appetite gets.
zh: 我越吃胃口越大。

en: There's no need to advertise a good sake.
zh: 好酒不怕巷子深。

en: He came to school even though he was unwell.
zh: 他即使身体不舒服也来上学了。

en: I haven't studied that much!
zh: 我没怎么学习！

en: Tom has memorised so many kanji that he can read books for primary school children.
zh: 汤姆记住了很多汉字，他可以读小学儿童的书。

en: Akiko is busy enough to forget her appointments.
zh: 明子忙得连约会都忘了。

en: If the ball hits you somewhere else than on the head or hands, you're out.
zh: 如果球击中你头部或手以外的任何地方，你就出局了。

en: Archeology is a science that studies the activities of human beings and their changes through the study of the traces left by them.
zh: 考古学是一门研究人类活动及其变化的科学，通过研究他们留下的痕迹。

en: There was a report from the neighbours because a drunkard was making noise in the park. When the police officers arrived at the scene, Kusanagi was alone, dead drunk and completely naked.
zh: 邻居们报告说，一个醉汉在公园里吵闹。当警察赶到现场时，草薙独自一人，烂醉如泥，一丝不挂。

en: From the corridor, you can reach the living room, the kitchen, and the toilet, or you can take the stairs upstairs, where the bedrooms and the bathroom are.
zh: 从走廊可以到达客厅、厨房和厕所，也可以走楼梯上楼，那里有卧室和浴室。

en: There were assassination theories but it was not clear who would have killed him and for what reason. Even now the truth about his death is unclear.
zh: 有关于暗杀的理论，但尚不清楚谁会杀害他以及出于什么原因。即使现在，关于他死亡的真相仍然不明。

en: I won't quit, no matter what you say.
zh: 无论你说什么，我都不会放弃。

en: No matter what you say, I won't give up.
zh: 无论你说什么，我都不会放弃。

en: Benjamin called the sense of awe and reverence experienced before a great work of art "aura".
zh: 本雅明将面对伟大艺术作品时所体验到的敬畏和崇敬感称为“灵光”。

en: This is a DVD.
zh: 这是一张DVD。

en: A prudent bird chooses its tree. A wise servant chooses his master.
zh: 聪明的鸟选择树，明智的仆人选择主人。

en: Finally!
zh: 终于！

en: Much better to be woken by the birds than by an alarm.
zh: 被鸟儿叫醒比被闹钟叫醒好多了。

en: Does objective history exist?
zh: 客观历史存在吗？

en: The woman is reading.
zh: 那个女人在读书。

en: Just as water, gas, and electricity are brought into our houses from far off to satisfy our needs in response to a minimal effort, so we shall be supplied with visual or auditory images, which will appear and disappear at a simple movement of the hand, hardly more than a sign.
zh: 正如水、煤气和电力从远处被引入我们的房屋，以满足我们的需求，只需付出最小的努力，我们也将获得视觉或听觉图像，它们将在一个简单的手势中出现和消失，几乎只是一个信号。

en: Before, young ones used to ask me to draw them a sheep, now they want me to teach them how to make a commit. Times, they are a-changin'.
zh: 以前，年轻人过去常让我给他们画一只绵羊，现在他们想让我教他们如何提交。时代在变。

en: It would not be an exaggeration to say that Augustine's thought had an influence not only on Christianity but on the whole of Western thought.
zh: 毫不夸张地说，奥古斯丁的思想不仅对基督教，而且对整个西方思想都产生了影响。

en: It is normal practise to contact the company's home office in these kinds of cases.
zh: 在这种情况下，联系公司总部是正常的做法。

en: How are you doing? I haven't seen you for an age!
zh: 你好吗？好久不见了！

en: It is better to keep your mouth shut and appear stupid than to open it and remove all doubt.
zh: 宁可闭嘴让人觉得你愚蠢，也不要开口消除所有疑虑。

en: A banker is a fellow who lends you his umbrella when the sun is shining, but wants it back the minute it begins to rain.
zh: 银行家是这样一种人，当阳光明媚时，他会借给你雨伞，但一旦开始下雨，他就会要回去。

en: The government is looking for ways to monitor online chatter about political issues and correct what it perceives as misinformation.
zh: 政府正在寻找方法来监控关于政治问题的在线讨论，并纠正它认为的虚假信息。

en: Please.
zh: 请。

en: When cleaning the classroom, a few students carry the podium.
zh: 打扫教室的时候，有几个学生抬讲台。

en: It has been shown that there is a relation between various neurotransmitters and hormones and aggressive behavior.
zh: 研究表明，多种神经递质和激素与攻击性行为之间存在关联。

en: Interspecies aggression is oriented towards goals related to reproduction.
zh: 物种间的攻击行为通常以与繁殖相关的目标为导向。

en: The most visible forms of aggression are often seen between prey and predator.
zh: 最常见的攻击形式通常出现在猎物和捕食者之间。

en: Because of this it will probably be generally cloudy and rainy weather over tonight and tomorrow.
zh: 因此，今晚和明天可能普遍是多云和阴雨天气。

en: Squad Leader Justin, a blip's appeared on the hyperspace radar!
zh: 队长贾斯汀，超空间雷达上出现了一个光点！

en: Contrary to expectations, they won with ease.
zh: 与预期相反，他们轻松获胜。

en: It was the first time I'd walked along the Mogami River.
zh: 那是我第一次沿着最上川散步。

en: It isn't a problem as long as I come back into the room right after finishing smoking, is it?
zh: 只要我抽完烟后立刻回到房间就没问题吧？

en: Off-target. My opponent hadn't been hit.
zh: 脱靶了。我的对手没有被打中。

en: Please be certain to answer the phone.
zh: 请务必接听电话。

en: I got two Bs this semester.
zh: 这学期我得了两个B。

en: The tomato crop is of good quality.
zh: 番茄的收成质量很好。

en: We used emergency measures to revive the cardiac arrest patient.
zh: 我们采取了紧急措施来抢救心脏骤停的病人。

en: All animals are equal, but some animals are more equal than others.
zh: 所有动物生来平等，但有些动物比其他动物更平等。

en: I think you will find it convenient to put a short-cut on the desktop.
zh: 我想你会觉得在桌面上放一个快捷方式很方便。

en: I don't want your pity.
zh: 我不需要你的怜悯。

en: I went on the trip, leaving the house in her care.
zh: 我出去旅行了，把房子交给她照看。

en: It seems that the stuff about the fine was made up.
zh: 看来关于罚款的事是编造的。

en: I think you can't understand that feeling unless you're from the same generation.
zh: 我想除非你是同一代人，否则你无法理解那种感觉。

en: I often listen to soothing music in order to relax.
zh: 我经常听舒缓的音乐来放松身心。

en: The Balkan Mountain range runs across Bulgaria from west to east.
zh: 巴尔干山脉从西向东横穿保加利亚。

en: I made very short work of the big steak.
zh: 我很快就把那块大牛排吃完了。

en: The researcher suggested promising directions for treating the cancer.
zh: 研究人员提出了治疗癌症的有希望的方向。

en: The course of action is unclear.
zh: 行动方案尚不明确。

en: The Cabinet sent round an official notice.
zh: 内阁发出了正式通知。

en: What this club is today is largely due to the effort of these people.
zh: 这个俱乐部今天能有这样的成就，很大程度上归功于这些人的努力。

en: I'm really flattered to hear that.
zh: 听到这话我真是受宠若惊。

en: People taking pharmacy with the intent of becoming chemists should choose the six year course.
zh: 打算成为化学家而学习药学的人应该选择六年制的课程。

en: Kazuko bared her breast and fed the baby.
zh: 和子袒露乳房给婴儿喂奶。

en: Thursday Island is situated in the Torres Strait between Australia's northernmost Cape York and New Guinea.
zh: 星期四岛位于澳大利亚最北端的约克角和新几内亚之间的托雷斯海峡。

en: We have new data about production and sale of electric fly swatters worldwide.
zh: 我们有关于全球电蚊拍生产和销售的新数据。

en: Be just before you are generous.
zh: 先公正，后慷慨。

en: Be silent, or speak something worth hearing.
zh: 要么保持沉默，要么说些有价值的话。

en: Either stop talking or say something worth hearing.
zh: 要么停止说话，要么说些有价值的话。

en: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
zh: 情人眼里出西施。

en: Beggars cannot be choosers.
zh: 乞丐不能挑肥拣瘦。

en: The cheapest is the best.
zh: 最便宜的就是最好的。

en: Better an egg today than a hen tomorrow.
zh: 宁要今天的一个鸡蛋，不要明天的一只鸡。

en: We'd probably be best off beating them to the punch before they notice that fact.
zh: 我们最好在他们注意到这件事之前先发制人。

en: At this language centre, about 15 international languages are taught, including English.
zh: 在这个语言中心，教授大约15种国际语言，包括英语。

en: Of course "Hayabusa" is not actually closing in on the Sun, it is just positioned as in the figure so that, seen from the Earth, it is on the opposite side of the Sun; this is called 'conjunction'.
zh: 当然，“隼鸟”号实际上并没有接近太阳，它只是如图所示那样定位，以便从地球上看，它位于太阳的另一侧；这被称为“合”。

en: What he says is nonsense.
zh: 他说的是胡说八道。

en: Many old people choke to death while eating mochi.
zh: 很多老人吃年糕噎死。

en: With North Korea's announcement on the 26th of its nuclear development plan based upon the agreement stemming from the Six Party Talks, and the United States' commencement of procedures to remove North Korea from its designation on the list of State Sponsors of Terrorism, the families of abductees have expressed growing unease that it may constitute an abandonment of the abductee issue.
zh: 随着朝鲜在26日宣布基于六方会谈协议的核开发计划，以及美国开始将朝鲜从其恐怖主义赞助国名单中移除的程序，被绑架者家属越来越不安，认为这可能构成对绑架问题的放弃。

en: He had no other clothing than that which he was wearing then.
zh: 他没有其他的衣服，只有当时穿在身上的那件。

en: Tighten the defences! They're coming!
zh: 加强防御！他们来了！

en: The only evidence was the traces of semen stuck to the underwear.
zh: 唯一的证据是粘在内裤上的精液痕迹。

en: In its home country, France, Tatoeba became a social and cultural phenomenon.
zh: Tatoeba 在其祖国法国成为了一种社会和文化现象。

en: He's a hopeless case.
zh: 他是个没救的人。

en: What is it that you want to achieve, whatever it takes, before you die?
zh: 在你死之前，无论付出什么代价，你最想实现的是什么？

en: He's just got a large build, so he looks like he'd be a fighter, but he's probably really a pushover.
zh: 他只是身材比较魁梧，所以看起来像个战士，但他可能实际上是个软柿子。

en: Take out a matchbox and a needle and thread.
zh: 拿出一个火柴盒、一根针和线。

en: In that word is included the meaning of matching up to somebody's particular wavelength.
zh: 那个词包含了与某人的特定频率相匹配的含义。

en: There is also one type of idealism that says even without strength or intelligence you can do anything if you can merely persist.
zh: 还有一种理想主义认为，即使没有力量或智慧，只要坚持下去，你也能做到任何事情。

en: "Oy, what's up, Tanji?" "I'm having trouble because there's a unit I didn't take at my last school."
zh: “喂，炭治，怎么了？” “我遇到了麻烦，因为我上学期有一门课没上。”

en: Shu, you're eating too much. You'll get fat!
zh: 舒，你吃太多了。你会变胖的！

en: Apparently the wound itself only needs a few stitches.
zh: 显然，伤口本身只需要缝几针。

en: Uninstall method: Chuck the whole folder into the recycle bin.
zh: 卸载方法：把整个文件夹扔进回收站。

en: A spectre is haunting Europe — the spectre of communism.
zh: 一个幽灵正在欧洲游荡——共产主义的幽灵。

en: That won't work!
zh: 那行不通！

en: Each man calls barbarism whatever is not his own practice.
zh: 每个人都称不属于自己习俗的东西为野蛮。

en: For man, there is no beast more scary than man.
zh: 对于人类来说，没有比人类更可怕的野兽了。

en: Does milk spoil quickly?
zh: 牛奶容易变质吗？

en: Nutella is not very well known in Japan. However, in America and Europe it's a popular spread and various sized jars of Nutella may be seen lined up inside many grocery stores and supermarkets.
zh: Nutella 在日本不是很出名。 然而，在美国和欧洲，它是一种流行的涂抹酱，在许多杂货店和超市里可以看到各种尺寸的 Nutella 罐子排列在一起。

en: When the dog tried to bite me, I held him down by the neck and thoroughly scolded him.
zh: 当狗试图咬我时，我按住它的脖子，狠狠地训斥了它。

en: Compared to many other countries, the average intake of trans-fats per person in Japan is low and it is hypothesized that it does not have a strong impact on health.
zh: 与许多其他国家相比，日本人均反式脂肪的平均摄入量较低，据推测它对健康没有强烈影响。

en: The Miami Heat is a pro basketball team part of the NBA and located in Miami.
zh: 迈阿密热火队是 NBA 的一支职业篮球队，位于迈阿密。

en: I like summer, but I can't stand the heat.
zh: 我喜欢夏天，但我受不了酷暑。

en: What with the heat and the humidity, he couldn't sleep well.
zh: 由于天气炎热潮湿，他睡不好。

en: I have two cousins.
zh: 我有两个堂/表兄弟姐妹。

en: It's also scary when the lightning strikes across the sky, but what's really scary is the sound. Once, my house was struck by lightning and since then I've become even more scared.
zh: 闪电划过天空也很可怕，但真正可怕的是声音。 有一次，我的房子被闪电击中，从那以后我就变得更加害怕了。

en: I have my year-end exams in 2 days, yet I'm not studying at all.
zh: 我两天后就要期末考试了，但我根本没在学习。

en: There are problems that Japan might not be able to solve independently but which it might be able to solve in cooperation with Korea.
zh: 日本可能无法独立解决，但可以通过与韩国合作解决的问题。

en: A woman in movement clothed in what resembles a bikini is drawn on a Sicilian mosaic from 5th century Rome.
zh: 在西西里岛一幅公元 5 世纪的罗马马赛克上，画着一位穿着类似比基尼的运动女性。

en: Having asked Jordan to watch after the house, I went out.
zh: 我请乔丹帮忙照看房子，然后就出门了。

en: Shugo is a colloquial way of referring to someone who can drink large quantities of alcohol and additionally not feel the effects of intoxication.
zh: 酒豪是一种口语化的说法，指的是能喝大量酒并且感觉不到醉意的人。

en: I didn't know which to take. I looked for a station attendant but didn't find one.
zh: 我不知道该选哪个。我找了车站工作人员，但没找到。

en: Answer the following questions in English.
zh: 请用英语回答下列问题。

en: What's the difference between a village and a town?
zh: 村庄和城镇有什么区别？

en: Where does your grandpa live?
zh: 你爷爷住在哪里？

en: Her parents can't help worrying about her injuries.
zh: 她父母忍不住担心她的伤势。

en: No one knows if he loves her or not.
zh: 没有人知道他是否爱她。

en: I think it's very difficult for an Englishman to imitate a real American accent.
zh: 我认为一个英国人很难模仿出真正的美国口音。

en: Did you buy that book?
zh: 你买那本书了吗？

en: Today, I went to the doctor's.
zh: 今天，我去看医生了。

en: I went to the doctor today.
zh: 我今天去看医生了。

en: The castle is beautiful.
zh: 这座城堡很漂亮。

en: This castle is beautiful.
zh: 这座城堡很漂亮。

en: Students spend a lot of time playing.
zh: 学生们花很多时间玩耍。

en: Today, I was supposed to study at the library but I woke up around 12 o'clock.
zh: 今天，我本来应该在图书馆学习的，但我大约12点才醒来。

en: It's not clear right now whether time travel is really something that exists in reality but its possibility has been proven by theoretical physics.
zh: 目前尚不清楚时间旅行是否真的存在于现实中，但理论物理学已经证明了它的可能性。

en: Sustainable development is the concept of the current generation utilizing the environment and meet human demands while not harming the ability of future generations to satisfy their own demands and interests.
zh: 可持续发展是指当代人在利用环境和满足人类需求的同时，不损害后代满足自身需求和利益的能力。

en: I think the actions he took were right.
zh: 我认为他采取的行动是正确的。

en: Today, even though he has not put on his armor, he has not forgotten to carry his sword.
zh: 今天，即使他没有穿上盔甲，也没有忘记携带他的剑。

en: I often see cheap accessories made of agate sold in street stalls and such but are they the real thing?
zh: 我经常在街边摊位上看到用玛瑙制成的廉价饰品，但它们是真的吗？

en: I phoned my son before boarding the plane, telling him to come to the airport to pick me up.
zh: 登机前，我给儿子打了电话，告诉他来机场接我。

en: The person standing at the front of the room is a professor in the History Department.
zh: 站在房间前面的人是历史系的教授。

en: Since he became a third year student, the only day he came to school was the day of the opening ceremony.
zh: 自从他成为三年级学生以来，他唯一来学校的那天是开学典礼那天。

en: We hurried to the train station.
zh: 我们赶紧去火车站。

en: He changes his opinions one after another.
zh: 他朝令夕改。

en: I have a stomach ache.
zh: 我肚子疼。

en: If you are going to the library this afternoon, would you please return two books for me whilst you are there?
zh: 如果你今天下午去图书馆，能不能顺便帮我还两本书？

en: We weren't at home yesterday.
zh: 我们昨天不在家。

en: Hungry puppies are barking on the street.
zh: 饥饿的小狗在街上叫。

en: I love math.
zh: 我喜欢数学。

en: Where did all the bread go?
zh: 面包都去哪儿了？

en: The door of the office is yellow.
zh: 办公室的门是黄色的。

en: That book is theirs.
zh: 那本书是他们的。

en: Do you have this new book?
zh: 你有这本新书吗？

en: Dogs bark when the caravan passes by.
zh: 狗吠火车过。

en: If men are wolves then women are devils.
zh: 如果男人是狼，那么女人就是魔鬼。

en: The truth is incontrovertible. Panic may resent it, ignorance may deride it, malice may distort it, but there it is.
zh: 事实是无可辩驳的。恐慌可能会憎恨它，无知可能会嘲笑它，恶意可能会歪曲它，但它就在那里。

en: Now this is not the end. It is not even the beginning of the end. But it is, perhaps, the end of the beginning.
zh: 现在这不是结束。甚至不是结束的开始。但也许，这是开始的结束。

en: That's not a knife. THIS is a knife.
zh: 那不是刀。这才是刀。

en: Spider-Man is cool. Spiders are NOT.
zh: 蜘蛛侠很酷。蜘蛛一点都不酷。

en: There were many guests - most of them were our teacher's classmates and friends.
zh: 有很多客人——他们中的大多数是我们老师的同学和朋友。

en: We asked our teacher: "Where will the wedding be held?"
zh: 我们问老师：“婚礼将在哪里举行？”

en: The mountain path was under a blanket of leaves, soft and easy to walk on.
zh: 山路被落叶覆盖，柔软而易于行走。

en: He was found guilty of attempted murder for attacking his mother with a knife.
zh: 他因用刀袭击母亲而被判犯有谋杀未遂罪。

en: When I'm with a crying baby, I end up wanting to cry myself!
zh: 当我和哭闹的婴儿在一起时，我最终也想哭！

en: I is an other.
zh: 我是另一个。

en: It's a painful 'truth' for us, but watching this movie brought home to me again the danger facing Earth.
zh: 这对我们来说是一个痛苦的“真相”，但观看这部电影再次让我意识到地球面临的危险。

en: I feel it unfortunate that there is little of this kind of humble attitude amongst Japanese debaters.
zh: 我觉得不幸的是，日本辩论者中很少有这种谦逊的态度。

en: The first thing that hits you is the bright red discount drugstore sign.
zh: 首先映入眼帘的是鲜红色的折扣药妆店招牌。

en: I was simply entranced by the beauty of her face.
zh: 我完全被她美丽的容颜迷住了。

en: We decided to make a deal with him.

zh: 你支持还是反对堕胎？

en: Many people think I'm crazy.
zh: 很多人认为我疯了。

en: What is happiness?
zh: 什么是幸福？

en: There is a metro in Kazan.
zh: 喀山有地铁。

en: South Africa is far away.
zh: 南非很远。

en: Daddy, buy me a vuvuzela!
zh: 爸爸，给我买个呜呜祖啦！

en: Buddhism is a religion founded by the Indian Shakyamuni.
zh: 佛教是由印度释迦牟尼创立的宗教。

en: What will you do when you grow up?
zh: 你长大后想做什么？

en: Oh boy...
zh: 哎呀，糟糕...

en: The widget that overcomes Web-Marketing's weaknesses.
zh: 这个小部件可以克服网络营销的弱点。

en: It isn't hard to overcome your weaknesses.
zh: 克服你的弱点并不难。

en: My wrist and forearm hurt, I think I might be suffering from carpal tunnel syndrome.
zh: 我的手腕和前臂疼，我想我可能得了腕管综合症。

en: Come here, little girl, sit down!
zh: 过来，小姑娘，坐下！

en: One fine morning in spring along came the great-great-granddaughter of the man who had built this house.
zh: 在一个晴朗的春日早晨，建造这所房子的人的曾曾孙女来了。

en: Let me google that for you.
zh: 让我帮你用谷歌搜索一下。

en: When I started using a computer I was taken in by Norton's CPU-hungry software and had a lot of trouble.
zh: 当我开始使用电脑时，我被诺顿占用大量CPU的软件所迷惑，遇到了很多麻烦。

en: Have you ever tried body painting?
zh: 你有没有尝试过人体彩绘？

en: I don't like frisk searches.
zh: 我不喜欢搜身。

en: I really need this camera for my trip to Osaka.
zh: 我真的很需要这个相机去大阪旅行。

en: However if you can speak Chinese, Korean, etc. you're able to share your way of thinking with many more people.
zh: 但是，如果你会说中文、韩语等，你就能与更多的人分享你的思维方式。

en: What slips in and out of view in the background is the real estate slump of recent years.
zh: 背景中时隐时现的是近年来房地产市场的低迷。

en: Children all leave the nest one day.
zh: 孩子们总有一天都会离开巢穴。

en: This boy is a genius at controlling RC vehicles!
zh: 这个男孩在控制遥控车辆方面是个天才！

en: When you skateboard, it puts quite a strain on your knees.
zh: 你玩滑板的时候，会对你的膝盖造成很大的压力。

en: During that time, we only heard about thieves, about murders, about men who had died of hunger.
zh: 在那段时间里，我们只听说过小偷，听说过谋杀，听说过饿死的人。

en: Were you able to open up and talk?
zh: 你能够敞开心扉交谈吗？

en: Rich mineral deposits have been discovered recently in Afghanistan.
zh: 最近在阿富汗发现了丰富的矿藏。

en: One of the characteristics of the Ancien Régime is that almost everybody had privileges, except peasants.
zh: 旧制度的特征之一是几乎每个人都有特权，除了农民。

en: I missed you.
zh: 我想你了。

en: Do you often travel abroad?
zh: 你经常出国旅行吗？

en: The princess's taste for pleasures was expanding; and we thought only about how to sprinkle on them new seasonings, so as to give them more spice.
zh: 公主对享乐的品味越来越高，而我们只想着如何给这些享乐撒上新的调味品，让它们更有味道。

en: Crows often fish through garbage.
zh: 乌鸦经常在垃圾堆里觅食。

en: The number of anorexic high school girls practicing extreme dietary restrictions is increasing.
zh: 患有厌食症并进行极端饮食限制的高中女生人数正在增加。

en: Mother Theresa devoutly cared for old people.
zh: 特蕾莎修女虔诚地照顾老人。

en: I can't decide which dress I should buy.
zh: 我不知道该买哪件连衣裙。

en: In my secondary school days, I was much impressed by how my hospitalised grandfather would often tell the nurses there, "Thank you, I appreciate your help."
zh: 在我中学时代，我印象最深刻的是我住院的祖父经常对那里的护士说：“谢谢你，我很感激你的帮助。”

en: Mrs Tanaka liked to carry out first aid on the injured and take care of the sick.
zh: 田中太太喜欢对伤者进行急救，并照顾病人。

en: This student's books are new.
zh: 这个学生的书是新的。

en: Long long ago in India, a monkey, a fox, and a rabbit lived happily together.
zh: 很久很久以前在印度，一只猴子、一只狐狸和一只兔子幸福地生活在一起。

en: The three animals tried to help the old man, the monkey using its ability to climb to collect fruit and nuts, and the fox catching fish in the stream to bring to him.
zh: 这三种动物试图帮助老人，猴子利用其攀爬能力收集水果和坚果，狐狸在溪流中捕鱼带给他。

en: The rabbit did not have any special abilities but devotedly attended the old man.
zh: 兔子没有任何特殊能力，但虔诚地照顾老人。

en: The old man who'd fallen was really Buddha.
zh: 摔倒的老人实际上是佛陀。

en: Buddha, impressed by the rabbit's efforts, raised him unto the moon and set him in that form forever more.
zh: 佛陀被兔子的努力所感动，将他提升到月亮上，并以那种形式永远地固定在那里。

en: We have two kids.
zh: 我们有两个孩子。

en: He probably got tired of waiting and fell asleep.
zh: 他可能等累了，睡着了。

en: That's correct. In Japanese, ウエートレス corresponds both to the English "waitress" and "weightless". However, "waitress" is the more usual meaning.
zh: 没错。在日语中，ウエートレス 既对应英语的 "waitress"（女服务员）也对应 "weightless"（失重）。但是，“waitress”是更常用的意思。

en: That's right. In Japanese, "uetoresu" corresponds both to the English "waitress" and "weightless". However, "waitress" is the more common meaning.
zh: 没错。在日语中，“uetoresu” 既对应英语的 "waitress"（女服务员）也对应 "weightless"（失重）。但是，“waitress”是更常用的意思。

en: On June 18 at the Niigata city aquarium, 7000 fish died because of a mistake by an employee.
zh: 6月18日，在新泻市水族馆，由于一名员工的失误，7000条鱼死亡。

en: Mr Koizumi is really full of himself.
zh: 小泉先生真是自命不凡。

en: I planted an apple tree in my garden.
zh: 我在我的花园里种了一棵苹果树。

en: Even superheroes need an occasional break.
zh: 即使是超级英雄也需要偶尔休息一下。

en: It's too bad, but your character gets killed at the start of the play.
zh: 太可惜了，你的角色在戏一开始就被杀死了。

en: Since the role I play is that of a tree, it's just as if I didn't have one.
zh: 因为我扮演的角色是一棵树，所以就好像我没有角色一样。

en: Let's race to the Izakaya!
zh: 我们赛跑去居酒屋吧！

en: Let's race to the pub!
zh: 我们赛跑去酒吧吧！

en: After his wedding, Alain left his small, moldy apartment and led an extravagant life.
zh: 阿兰结婚后，离开了又小又发霉的公寓，过上了奢侈的生活。

en: I heard that Isezaki city decided to ban beards for male city employees starting June 19. It's the complete opposite of the Taliban laws imposing the wearing of beards.
zh: 我听说伊势崎市决定从6月19日起禁止男性公务员留胡子。这与塔利班强制留胡子的法律完全相反。

en: I like to watch TV in my Jacuzzi.
zh: 我喜欢在按摩浴缸里看电视。

en: Mr. Koizumi talks endlessly without stopping.
zh: 小泉先生没完没了地说个不停。

en: Candles gleamed brightly besides the jacuzzi.
zh: 蜡烛在按摩浴缸旁闪闪发光。

en: I put all of the sheets to dry on the pole.
zh: 我把所有的床单都晾在杆子上了。

en: This region produces precious minerals.
zh: 这个地区出产珍贵的矿产。

en: Due to my lumbago, I won't be able to attend Koizumi's party.
zh: 由于腰痛，我不能参加小泉的派对。

en: My back hurts because I've been fishing all day.
zh: 我背痛，因为我钓了一整天的鱼。

en: Mayumi gathered her small change and bought a beach ball.
zh: 真弓收集了她的小零钱，买了一个沙滩球。

en: What my mother had said was true.
zh: 我妈妈说的是真的。

en: When you wear that dress, you look like a slut.
zh: 你穿那件衣服的时候，看起来像个荡妇。

en: Crap! My girlfriend is already back! What should we do?!
zh: 糟糕！我女朋友已经回来了！我们该怎么办？！

en: My friend Kim has really bad anal bleeding sometimes.
zh: 我的朋友金有时候肛门出血很严重。

en: He put the book on the shelf.
zh: 他把书放在了书架上。

en: We plan to climb that mountain.
zh: 我们计划爬那座山。

en: I want to learn Chinese next year.
zh: 我明年想学中文。

en: After having anal sex with my girlfriend, we usually need to have a good wash.
zh: 和女朋友肛交后，我们通常需要好好清洗一下。

en: Kim is so tight, if you stuck a lump of coal up her ass, in two weeks you'd have a diamond!
zh: 金太紧了，如果你把一块煤塞进她的屁股里，两个星期后你就会得到一颗钻石！

en: As I thought, she's a virgin!
zh: 果然不出我所料，她是个处女！

en: Subdued girls are generally the prettiest I reckon. The loud, bustling ones are awful.
zh: 我觉得，文静的女孩通常是最漂亮的。那些吵闹喧嚣的太糟糕了。

en: When I hear this song, I think of you, and miss you.
zh: 当我听到这首歌时，我会想起你，想念你。

en: "What a cute puppy. Why is he called Panda?" "Because his face looks like a panda."
zh: “多么可爱的小狗。它为什么叫熊猫？”“因为它的脸看起来像熊猫。”

en: I'm going to a training camp tomorrow. However it's not the physical side that I'll be training, but the mental.
zh: 我明天要去训练营。然而，我训练的不是身体方面，而是精神方面。

en: Do you want to know my secret? It's very simple...
zh: 你想知道我的秘密吗？其实很简单……

en: Can't you apply the rules a little more elastically?
zh: 你就不能稍微灵活地运用一下规则吗？

en: The bag I left on the passenger seat is missing!
zh: 我放在副驾驶座位上的包不见了！

en: Thank you for inviting us to dinner.
zh: 谢谢你邀请我们来吃晚餐。

en: Kidding! I was simply invited to go out to dinner.
zh: 开玩笑的！我只是被邀请出去吃晚餐。

en: I'm feeling depressed on the inside, but you can't tell by looking, can you?
zh: 我内心感到很沮丧，但你看不出来，对吧？

en: Would you join me for some ballroom dancing?
zh: 你愿意和我一起跳交谊舞吗？

en: It seems that Mr Hatoyama is living in company housing.
zh: 看来鸠山先生是住在公司宿舍里。

en: I don't mind since I'm used to it, but the first guy who thought about making a hearse with a golden roof on top of it, he must have had quite bad taste.
zh: 我因为已经习惯了所以不介意，但是第一个想到要在灵车上装一个金色屋顶的人，他的品味一定很差。

en: My husband tells me he goes to work even on Sundays and holidays but sometimes I suspect there's something fishy about his story.
zh: 我丈夫告诉我他即使在周日和节假日也去上班，但我有时怀疑他的话有些蹊跷。

en: The most incredible thing about miracles is that they happen.
zh: 关于奇迹，最不可思议的事情是它们真的会发生。

en: Who will avenge the death of Karl?
zh: 谁来为卡尔的死报仇？

en: All three of us are students.
zh: 我们三个都是学生。

en: The secret of Hegel's dialectic lies ultimately in this alone, that it negates theology through philosophy in order then to negate philosophy through theology.
zh: 黑格尔辩证法的秘密最终就在于此，它通过哲学否定神学，然后又通过神学否定哲学。

en: Only in philosophy can you use a circular argument and get praised for it.
zh: 只有在哲学中，你才能使用循环论证并因此受到赞扬。

en: He who has love, is in God, and God is in him, for God is love.
zh: 凡有爱心的，就住在神里面，神也住在他里面，因为神就是爱。

en: The Way to see by Faith, is to shut the Eye of Reason: The Morning Daylight appears plainer when you put out your Candle.
zh: 用信仰去看待事物的方法，就是闭上理性的眼睛：当你熄灭蜡烛时，晨光显得更加明亮。

en: Kentucky screams "fuck".
zh: 肯塔基州尖叫着“去他妈的”。

en: Was it a car or a cat I saw?
zh: 我看到的是汽车还是猫？

en: Appetite comes with eating, but the thirst goes away with drinking.
zh: 食欲是吃出来的，但口渴是喝下去的。

en: The fundamental cause of the trouble is that in the modern world the stupid are cocksure while the intelligent are full of doubt.
zh: 麻烦的根本原因是，在现代世界，愚蠢的人都自信满满，而聪明的人却充满怀疑。

en: Patriots always talk of dying for their country, and never of killing for their country.
zh: 爱国者总是谈论为他们的国家而死，却从不谈论为他们的国家而杀戮。

en: To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead.
zh: 害怕爱就是害怕生活，而那些害怕生活的人已经死了三分之二。

en: War does not determine who is right — only who is left.
zh: 战争不能决定谁是对的，只能决定谁还活着。

en: You're Germans, aren't you?
zh: 你们是德国人，对吧？

en: I don't cry easily.
zh: 我不轻易哭泣。

en: Classes start at nine o'clock every day.
zh: 每天九点开始上课。

en: I would like to drink a coffee.
zh: 我想喝一杯咖啡。

en: Paul often drags heavy tools with him.
zh: 保罗经常拖着沉重的工具。

en: After the pictures were revealed, the actress' clean image was tainted.
zh: 照片曝光后，这位女演员的清纯形象受到了玷污。

en: Accept both good and bad.
zh: 好坏都要接受。

en: The bowling shop's opening ceremony was boring.
zh: 这家保龄球用品店的开幕式很无聊。

en: I was a student at that time.
zh: 那时我还是个学生。

en: I entered a singing contest sponsored by a pasta company and I made it to the semifinals.
zh: 我参加了一个意大利面公司赞助的歌唱比赛，并且进入了半决赛。

en: Because Lee was injured, the strength of the Stars has greatly diminished.
zh: 因为李受伤了，星队的实力大大减弱。

en: I was just drawing pictures, I had no further intention.
zh: 我只是在画画，没有其他意图。

en: Will humanity be able to prevent the degradation of ecosystems?
zh: 人类能够阻止生态系统的退化吗？

en: Are there dogs that eat raw fish?
zh: 有吃生鱼的狗吗？

en: It's a lie that, "they don't eat fish raw abroad."
zh: “国外不吃生鱼”是谎言。

en: He voluntarily helped his mum clean.
zh: 他主动帮他妈妈打扫卫生。

en: When watching TV, please ensure that the room is brightly lit and watch from a distance.
zh: 看电视时，请确保房间光线充足，并保持一定距离观看。

en: Social order does not come from nature. It is founded on customs.
zh: 社会秩序并非来自自然，而是建立在习俗之上。

en: Woman observes, man decides.
zh: 女人观察，男人决定。

en: Women observe and men think.
zh: 女性观察，男性思考。

en: If the life and death of Socrates was the life and death of a wise man, then the life and death of Jesus is the life and death of a God.
zh: 如果苏格拉底的生死是一个智者的生死，那么耶稣的生死就是一个神的生死。

en: She's smarter than him.
zh: 她比他聪明。

en: Lend me a memo pad or something.
zh: 借我一个便签本之类的。

en: And these signs shall follow them that believe; In my name shall they cast out devils; they shall speak with new tongues; they shall take up serpents; and if they drink any deadly thing it shall not hurt them; they shall lay hands on the sick, and they shall recover!
zh: 信的人必有神迹随着他们，就是奉我的名赶鬼，说新方言，手能拿蛇，若喝了什么毒物，也必不受害，手按病人，病人就必好了。

en: The weak are food for the strong.
zh: 弱肉强食。

en: These shoes are too small.
zh: 这鞋太小了。

en: Are you married?
zh: 你结婚了吗？

en: Ann doesn't have any sisters.
zh: 安没有姐妹。

en: Ann doesn't have a sister.
zh: 安没有姐妹。

en: The class begins at 8:30.
zh: 课程八点半开始。

en: Can I borrow something to write on?
zh: 我可以借点东西写字吗？

en: Do you have some paper or something?
zh: 你有纸或者什么东西吗？

en: Gimme something to write on.
zh: 给我点东西写字。

en: The coastal ecosystem of British Columbia is rapidly declining.
zh: 不列颠哥伦比亚省的沿海生态系统正在迅速衰退。

en: This movie is about a poor girl who gets mistaken for the daughter of a rich man in the confusion following a train crash.
zh: 这部电影讲述了一个贫穷的女孩在火车相撞后的混乱中被误认为是富人的女儿的故事。

en: I'm thinking about complaining about my son's teacher at the kindergarten.
zh: 我正在考虑向幼儿园投诉我儿子的老师。

en: It takes time to relax.
zh: 放松需要时间。

en: The Ying Yang diviner may not predict his own fate.
zh: 阴阳师可能无法预测自己的命运。

en: Physician, heal thyself.
zh: 医生，医治你自己吧。

en: My dream is to buy a Lamborghini tractor.
zh: 我的梦想是买一辆兰博基尼拖拉机。

en: Come home.
zh: 回家吧。

en: Men are greedy.
zh: 男人是贪婪的。

en: If I could be like that...
zh: 如果我能像那样就好了...

en: There's no doubt that the universe is infinite.
zh: 毫无疑问，宇宙是无限的。

en: Please translate this Japanese text into French.
zh: 请将这段日文翻译成法语。

en: The nakedness of woman is the work of God.
zh: 女人的裸体是上帝的作品。

en: My girlfriend's daughters have joined Facebook.
zh: 我女朋友的女儿们加入了脸书。

en: Would you mind if I sit at the same table?
zh: 你介意我坐在同一张桌子旁吗？

en: It is true that behavior cannot be legislated, and legislation cannot make you love me, but legislation can restrain you from lynching me, and I think that is kind of important.
zh: 行为确实无法通过立法来规范，立法也无法让你爱我，但是立法可以阻止你对我处以私刑，我认为这很重要。

en: But so that we may not cause offense, go to the lake and throw out your line. Take the first fish you catch; open its mouth and you will find a four-drachma coin. Take it and give it to them for my tax and yours.
zh: 但为了不冒犯他们，你到湖边去钓鱼，拿上来的第一条鱼，开了它的口，必得着一块钱，可以拿去给他们，作你我的税银。

en: I'm not a woman hater; and if I were, I would make an exception for you.
zh: 我不是一个厌恶女性的人；如果我是，我会为你破例。

en: All men naturally hate each other.
zh: 所有男人天生互相憎恨。

en: What's wrong about men ruling over women?
zh: 男人统治女人有什么不对？

en: I'm a serious office lady and a good wife and mother at home.
zh: 我在公司里是认真工作的职业女性，在家里是贤妻良母。

en: Men should keep out of the kitchen.
zh: 男人应该远离厨房。

en: The number of muffins that you'll receive will be inversely proportional to the number of times you talk on IRC.
zh: 你收到的松饼数量将与你在IRC上说话的次数成反比。

en: I think hairiness is a symbol of masculinity, so I really like it.
zh: 我认为毛发是男子气概的象征，所以我真的很喜欢。

en: Do you think that chest hair is sexy?
zh: 你觉得胸毛性感吗？

en: I've had my hair removed permanently, so my skin is smooth.
zh: 我已经永久性地去除了毛发，所以我的皮肤很光滑。

en: I'll stay here for a bit.
zh: 我将在这里待一会儿。

en: Do you speak French?
zh: 你会说法语吗？

en: "You OK?" "Wha-... Yes, it's nothing."
zh: “你没事吧？” “啊…没事，没什么。”

en: My personality is not at all serious!
zh: 我的性格一点也不严肃！

en: I'm trying mah-jong for the first time.
zh: 我第一次尝试麻将。

en: Did you buy this book?
zh: 你买了这本书吗？

en: French people don't think of anything as impossible.
zh: 法国人认为没有什么是不可能的。

en: Trang's party was as much fun as a funeral wake.
zh: 庄的派对像葬礼一样无聊。

en: Trang's party was like a wake.
zh: 庄的派对就像一场葬礼。

en: Former Olympic fencing champion Pál Schmitt has been elected President of Hungary.
zh: 前奥运会击剑冠军帕尔·施密特当选为匈牙利总统。

en: Only the dead have seen the end of war.
zh: 只有死者才能看到战争的结束。

en: “Yandex” search engine started supporting Tatar language too.
zh: “Yandex”搜索引擎也开始支持鞑靼语。

en: My past self is another person.
zh: 过去的我和现在的我不是同一个人。

en: Liar today, thief tomorrow.
zh: 今天说谎，明天偷窃。

en: He that will lie, will steal.
zh: 会说谎的人，也会偷窃。

en: Shillings, not greetings.
zh: 要钱不要客气。

en: My teacher always said, "You can find happiness if you rid yourself of selfishness".
zh: 我的老师总是说：“如果你摆脱自私，你就能找到幸福。”

en: 40, 50, is a snot-nosed brat.
zh: 四十、五十的，还是个黄毛小子。

en: While we were out for a picnic, our house's lock was picked by a thief.
zh: 我们出去野餐的时候，家里被小偷撬锁了。

en: Everything that is in this world is but a dream.
zh: 世间万物皆是梦。

en: "Really?" "Yes, really."
zh: “真的吗？”“真的。”

en: Happy Canada Day!
zh: 加拿大国庆日快乐！

en: It's quiet in the suburbs...
zh: 郊区很安静...

en: Tom learnt from Mr Ogawa that many people have scorn for the nouveau riche.
zh: 汤姆从小川先生那里得知，很多人都鄙视暴发户。

en: Long time, no see.
zh: 好久不见。

en: It's been a while since we last met.
zh: 好久不见了。

en: I haven't seen you in a long time.
zh: 好久不见了。

en: I haven't seen you for a while.
zh: 好久不见了。

en: I haven't seen you in ages.
zh: 好久不见了。

en: It's been a while, hasn't it?
zh: 好久不见了，是吧？

en: Long time no see!
zh: 好久不见！

en: Long time no see.
zh: 好久不见。

en: Wow! It's been a long time.
zh: 哇！好久不见了。

en: Both of those students didn't pass the test.
zh: 这两个学生都没通过考试。

en: The fundamental problem in arguing with a person who denies global warming is that they use erroneous logic.
zh: 与否认全球变暖的人争论的根本问题是他们使用了错误的逻辑。

en: Revenge is a dish best served cold.
zh: 君子报仇，十年不晚。

en: According to what I heard after, the teacher didn't come until the end of the class.
zh: 据我后来听说的，老师直到下课才来。

en: My old-fashioned grandfather complains about the way girls are dressed nowadays.
zh: 我那老古董的爷爷抱怨现在的女孩穿着太暴露。

en: There's no such thing as a perfect sentence. Just as there's no such thing as perfect despair.
zh: 没有完美的句子，就像没有完美的绝望一样。

en: Comedy is much closer to real life than drama.
zh: 喜剧比戏剧更贴近现实生活。

en: Things that you see with your eyes are not necessarily true.
zh: 眼见不一定为实。

en: If you look from afar, most things will look nice.
zh: 远看多数都好看。

en: It's not immoral for a novelist to tell lies. In fact, the bigger the lies, the better lies, and the more the common folks and critics will praise you.
zh: 小说家说谎并不不道德。事实上，谎言越大，越好，老百姓和评论家就越会赞扬你。

en: The wall separating criminals from non-criminals is not as thick as we think.
zh: 将罪犯与非罪犯区分开的墙壁并不像我们想象的那么厚。

en: Forget about the past. Compared to yesterday, I like today more. That's why I try to enjoy the moment, that's all.
zh: 忘记过去吧。与昨天相比，我更喜欢今天。所以我尽量享受当下，仅此而已。

en: Lenses with two distinct optical powers are also called "bifocals".
zh: 具有两种不同光学度数的镜片也称为“双光镜”。

en: I wonder what effect technical advances such as the Internet, mobile phones and digitalization technology have on the people's awareness, actions and interest in politics.
zh: 我想知道互联网、手机和数字化技术等技术进步对人们的意识、行动和对政治的兴趣有什么影响。

en: Hey, you! No running by the pool!
zh: 嘿，你！不要在游泳池边跑步！

en: At this time of day, most customers are adults here to exercise, there aren't that many kids.
zh: 在这个时间，大多数顾客都是来锻炼的成年人，没有那么多孩子。

en: When I got worried and went to check on him, it looked like he'd barricaded himself in the department's toilet and wasn't coming out.
zh: 当我担心地去查看他时，他看起来把自己堵在部门的厕所里，不肯出来。

en: However, the princess had barricaded herself in her room and wouldn't come out.
zh: 然而，公主把自己堵在房间里，不肯出来。

en: What do I think, you say ... well then, I'll give you my candid opinion.
zh: 你说我怎么想……好吧，那我就给你我的坦率意见。

en: "Your nose is dripping." "S-sorry."
zh: “你的鼻子在流鼻涕。”“对、对不起。”

en: Go to school! You lazy bastard.
zh: 去上学！你这个懒鬼。

en: Don't worry! Even if I drink, it doesn't have an effect on my driving.
zh: 别担心！即使我喝酒，也不会影响我开车。

en: She has no qualms about being violent towards her children.
zh: 她对对孩子施暴没有任何顾虑。

en: The thief-taker arrested many thieves at the same time.
zh: 捕盗官同时逮捕了许多盗贼。

en: You idiot!
zh: 你这个白痴！

en: Happy Fourth of July!
zh: 美国独立日快乐！

en: I'll come back to Australia the day after tomorrow.
zh: 后天我回澳大利亚。

en: Minnesota's state bird is the mosquito.
zh: 明尼苏达州的州鸟是蚊子。

en: She said, "Thank you for the meal," to the cook.
zh: 她对厨师说：“谢谢你的饭菜。”

en: Isn't Shinji a pain? He is, isn't he?
zh: 真嗣是不是很烦人？他就是，对吧？

en: "How old are you?" "I'm sixteen."
zh: “你多大了？”“我十六岁。”

en: Yes, what of it?
zh: 是，那又怎么样？

en: That's right, but what's it to you?
zh: 没错，但这关你什么事？

en: Hurt people hurt people.
zh: 受伤的人会伤害别人。

en: I can do it myself.
zh: 我自己可以做。

en: I think that it's dangerous to go walking alone at night.
zh: 我觉得晚上一个人走路很危险。

en: Example sentence no. 354618 created a lot of confusion on the Tatoeba website.
zh: Tatoeba网站上第354618号例句造成了很多混乱。

en: I've heard that Robert is ill.
zh: 我听说罗伯特病了。

en: I heard that Robert is ill.
zh: 我听说罗伯特病了。

en: I enjoy eating hot soup.
zh: 我喜欢喝热汤。

en: Nobody ever got rich by saving on drinks.
zh: 没有人靠节省饮料而致富。

en: "Are you OK?" "I'm fine!"
zh: “你没事吧？”“我没事！”

en: Hello, are you Mr Ogawa?
zh: 你好，请问是小川先生吗？

en: Is the university's library open now?
zh: 现在大学的图书馆开门了吗？

en: If we continue like this, it's as clear as day that the Japan of five years on will be in decline.
zh: 如果我们继续这样下去，五年后的日本衰落是显而易见的。

en: Let's eat a watermelon!
zh: 我们吃个西瓜吧！

en: This miserable old church is the oldest building in our country.
zh: 这座破旧的教堂是我们国家最古老的建筑。

en: Please take me out for dinner!
zh: 请带我去吃晚饭！

en: In America, the consumption of fast-food has tripled between 1977 and 1995.
zh: 在美国，1977年至1995年间，快餐消费增加了两倍。

en: I'd better get to bed soon.
zh: 我最好早点睡觉。

en: In times of crisis one should never idealise the past.
zh: 在危机时期，人们不应该理想化过去。

en: I've paid parking fines a number of times myself.
zh: 我自己也交过很多次停车罚款。

en: Obviously I agree that you should advance in life through your own efforts.
zh: 我当然同意你应该通过自己的努力在生活中取得进步。

en: This morning I had a bit of a disagreement with my wife. I didn't think it was a big deal, but seeing what she's like this evening I think I must have upset her.
zh: 今天早上我和我妻子有点小争执。我没觉得有什么大不了的，但看到她今晚的样子，我想我一定是惹她生气了。

en: Walking back from his house, I frantically searched through my memory.
zh: 从他家走回来的路上，我疯狂地搜索着我的记忆。

en: "What happened to your nose?" "When I was backing my car up I went to check behind me, convinced that the car window was open, and bashed my face into it!"
zh: “你的鼻子怎么了？”“我倒车的时候，确信车窗是开着的，就回头看，结果一头撞了上去！”

en: The net-cafes here cater to students; fees start at around a pound an hour.
zh: 这里的网吧主要服务于学生；费用大约从每小时一英镑起。

en: This financial audit also includes an evaluation of the company's assets.
zh: 这次财务审计还包括对公司资产的评估。
